ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This work was supported by a grant of the Romanian National Authority for Scientific Research and Innovation, CNCS/CCCDI-UEFISCDI, project number PNIII-P2-2.1.BG-2016-0126, within PNCDI III, BG-15, entitled “Natural products with antifungal activity”, acronym PNEA. We have been able to carry out this research with the support of Interdisciplinary Research Platform and Antioxidant Systems Research Laboratory A1c, belonging to Banat University of Agricultural Sciences and Veterinary Medicine “King Michael I of Romania’’ from Timisoara, where chemical, antifungal and herbicidal experiments were made. Also, the cytotoxic effect has been tested at the laboratories of Faculty of Pharmacy “Victor Babes” University of Medicine and Pharmacy Timisoara. We are grateful.
